simpson-travel-kb.name: HubSpot AI Knowledge Base
simpson-travel-kb.overview: AI-powered knowledge base with HubSpot integration, semantic search, and LLM-powered query responses

deliverables.name: Architecture & System Design
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: System architecture documented with Azure, API boundaries, security model defined

deliverables.name: OneNote (Microsoft Graph) Integration
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: OAuth app registered, Graph API integration functional with delta sync

deliverables.name: Website Content Extraction
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: API-based ingestion built, auth/rate limits handled, HTMLâ†’text conversion working

deliverables.name: Content Processing Pipeline
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Parsing, chunking, metadata enrichment, inconsistency detection implemented

deliverables.name: Search Infrastructure
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Hybrid search (BM25 + vector) configured with semantic search enabled

deliverables.name: Query Processing Engine
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Stage-1 LLM: intent detection, retrieval plan, query rewriting functional

deliverables.name: LLM Integration
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Stage-2 LLM: answer synthesis with guardrails and prompt injection defenses

deliverables.name: Citation System
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Verifiable citations implemented with client-specific templates

deliverables.name: API Development
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: REST API with auth, rate limiting, health checks, ingestion endpoints ready

deliverables.name: Performance Optimization
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Query response times <2s p50, search parameters tuned, caching optimized

deliverables.name: Technical Documentation
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Technical docs, runbooks, API documentation, ops quick-start guide complete

deliverables.name: HubSpot UI Development
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Native HubSpot UI built with HS components, response times <15s

deliverables.name: Azure Infrastructure Setup
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Azure resources configured

deliverables.name: HubSpot UI Phase-1
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Iframe embed coordination

deliverables.name: Integration Testing
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Test automation and QA complete

deliverables.name: Security Hardening
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Security implementation and testing

deliverables.name: Monitoring & Alerting
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Monitoring setup complete

deliverables.name: Knowledge Transfer & Handover
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Technical handover and documentation

deliverables.name: Solution Architecture & Discovery
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Solution design documented and approved by client

deliverables.name: Project Management
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Project milestones tracked, status reports delivered weekly

deliverables.name: Client Enablement Workshop
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria: Client team trained on workflows, documentation, and enablement assets handed over
